titleStmt.title: Aron-bimnucha, or, An antidote to cure the Calamites of their trembling for fear of the Ark to which is added Mr. Crofton's creed touching church-communion : with a brief answer to the position (pretended to be) taken out of his pocket and added to the end of a scandalous and schismatical pamphlet, entituled Jerubbaal justified.
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

titleStmt.title: Aron-bimnucha, or, An antidote to cure the Calamites of their trembling for fear of the Ark to which is added Mr. Crofton's creed touching church-communion : with a brief answer to the position (pretended to be) taken out of his pocket and added to the end of a scandalous and schismatical pamphlet, entituled Jerubbaal justified.
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

notesStmt.note: Running title: Israel's gratulation for the Arkes solemn settlement.
"Mr. Crofton's position examined and an imposed liturgy justified": p. 106-116.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
